
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber)
target_compile_options(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/base
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  ydb-core-base
  library-actors-interconnect
  library-actors-core
  cpp-testing-unittest
  core-testlib-basics
  testlib-basics-default
  minikql-comp_nodes-llvm
)
target_link_options(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)
target_sources(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/base/board_subscriber_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber
  TEST_TARGET
  contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)
target_allocator(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)
vcs_info(contrib-ydb-core-base-ut_board_subscriber)
